Class ec.cosm.costume.CostumePresentation 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.CostumePresentation
public class CostumePresentation
extends Object
implements RtCodeable
CostumePresentation wraps a costume together with colorization and texture information. It is used by PresentationAlgorithm as an intermediate data format.
